## ModuleFactory class

模块工厂

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ModuleFactory 
```

## Remarks

管理所有模块类、模块实例

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [aliasMap](./nodom3.modulefactory.aliasmap.md) | <code>static</code> | Map&lt;string, string&gt; | 别名map |
|  [classes](./nodom3.modulefactory.classes.md) | <code>static</code> | Map&lt;string, [UnknownClass](./nodom3.unknownclass.md)<!-- -->&gt; | 模块类集合 |
